channel.title: The fastest runescape cash
channel.description:
I was just going to make a thread to post the very fastest ways of making runescape money. I know there is already a thread like this, but this isn't limited by what level you are.
So my first idea is this:
Get 91 runecrafting 47 construction 70 range 96 summoning 40 mage
penance gloves boots of lightness spottier cape full black d hide All rune making pouches pack yak pouches etc at least 1000 x pure essence to start with. [maybe] energy pots
First start at edgevile bank, put on all the clothes I mentioned. Also have pouches in inventory. Bring your pack yak too. Right now fill everything you can with essence. Also don't forget to bring 1 law rune 1 air rune and 1 earth rune. So you should have about 80 essence. Now run all the way into the wilderness, go through the abyss, careful not to get killed. Then go to the nature rune altar. Craft all the natures, so you will have aproximately 160 nature runes. Now teleport to your house and use your mounted glory amulet to teleport back to edgeville. Rinse and repeat.
This method will make aproximately 35k a trip.
Anyone got any other great ways to make money?

item.title: The fastest runescape cash
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:19, topic:200993”]The fastest runescape cash is buying it. Self explanitory.[/quote]I know a faster way!

It’s called Artmoney!

But in all seriousness, who gives a fuck about rs cash. In my honored opinion, you are smarter to be selling it then buying it.

Read full topic

item.title: The fastest runescape cash
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:4, topic:200993”]You don’t seem to see where I was coming from with that. Summoning is the biggest problem I see in his plan.

You can’t just buy token things, you have to kill monsters for them, and you need a shit load of them to just get 50. The cost for shards, 2nd ingredients, and the time consuming run to the alter. I’d estimate you’d spend the next 2-4 months getting 96 summoning, that is, if you bought everything.[/quote]
Nooo I don’t think you got the idea of this thread, I was just explaining how you could make the most money in the shortest amount of time. I am in no way saying I’m going to do that. Cor getting them levels would take a year if not more.

You guys just didn’t get what I was saying lol. =D

Read full topic

item.title: The fastest runescape cash
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

You don’t seem to see where I was coming from with that. Summoning is the biggest problem I see in his plan.

You can’t just buy token things, you have to kill monsters for them, and you need a shit load of them to just get 50. The cost for shards, 2nd ingredients, and the time consuming run to the alter. I’d estimate you’d spend the next 2-4 months getting 96 summoning, that is, if you bought everything.

Read full topic

item.title: The fastest runescape cash
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

He has 70 Runecrafting already… which is a start.

I’m going to craft loads of nats at one point, and although it’s going to be a hell of a trip, I’m just gonna walk it. I don’t care how long it takes me. It’s alot simpler and cheaper and will most probably give a better sense of achievement.

You’ll need to figure out how much nats are on G.E obviously, then do the maths for how much 80 would be. If it’s not more than 35K then I’d definitely say don’t do it. You’ll already be stumped for cash from Summoning. If 35K includes the energy pots, then nvm. You won’t need them, the only dangers are revevenants and they won’t even be much of a problem - even if you’ve ran out of energy - 'cause you’re only walking into the Wildy for like, 20 seconds.

Read full topic

[maybe]
energy pots

This method will make aproximately 35k a trip.
